notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.M. conceived the study. J.M. and F.M.H. recommended analytical and graphical methods. C.-E.Y. performed the analysis, generated graphical results, and prepared the manuscript in consultation with J.M., D.M.R., F.M.H., and J.S.F. M.T. prepared the observational data. C.D.J. prepared the detailed PFT-level biomass data from the HadGEM2-ES model. All authors reviewed and edited the manuscript.
